Download these projects as part of the workshop curriculum.

Wordplay

Explore these short Python files that help you cheat at Scrabble or crossword puzzles. Wordplay is comptatible with both Python 2 & Python 3. Git clone or download zip file.

ColorWall

See how Python can be used to create simple animations.

ColorWall for Python3: Git Clone or download zip file.
